keyEvents.title: Fujitora Summons Meteor
keyEvents.description: Admiral Fujitora uses his gravity powers to summon a meteor from space, which crashes toward Green Bit. The meteor is sliced by Law, Doflamingo, and Fujitora, creating a massive crater.
keyEvents.significance: Green Bit becomes the site of one of the most devastating power displays in the series, with a meteor strike creating a massive crater.

keyEvents.title: Law's Shichibukai Status Revoked
keyEvents.description: On Green Bit, Admiral Fujitora officially revokes Trafalgar Law's title as Shichibukai.
keyEvents.significance: Green Bit becomes the location where Law loses his Shichibukai protection.

geographicDetails.terrain: Forested island with dangerous flora and fauna
notableFeatures: Connected to Dressrosa by a bridge
Massive crater created by meteor fragments

keyEvents.title: Luffy Tames Fighting Bull
keyEvents.description: Luffy uses Conqueror's Haki to tame the Fighting Bull Ucy in the Colosseum arena.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's growing mastery of Haki within the Colosseum's competitive environment.

keyEvents.title: Noland's Connection Revealed
keyEvents.description: Robin discovers a statue of Mont Blanc Noland in the Tontatta Kingdom. Leo explains that Noland saved the dwarves 400 years ago.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals the historical connection between Noland and the dwarves, validating Noland's heroic reputation.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Proclaimed as Usoland
keyEvents.description: The dwarves proclaim Usopp as 'Usoland,' believing he is a descendant of Noland and their prophesied hero.
keyEvents.significance: The kingdom rallies around Usopp as their leader in the fight against Doflamingo.

notableFeatures: Contains a statue of Mont Blanc Noland

keyEvents.title: Violet and Sanji Part Ways
keyEvents.description: Violet gives Sanji a map to the secret factory before splitting up in Dressrosa.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the ongoing operations across different parts of Dressrosa.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Reunites with Kin'emon
keyEvents.description: Sanji and Kin'emon reunite in Dressrosa while being pursued by Doflamingo's men.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the scattered alliance members working to regroup in Dressrosa.

geographicDetails.terrain: Island kingdom with cities and countryside
notableFeatures: Connected to Green Bit by bridge
